/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a stark contrast to the urban structures that flank it. Modern buildings rise in the background, their glass and steel facades reflecting the clear blue sky. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the city's vibrant energy.
